g.text: Filters out stop words, removes punctuation marks, and splits the document into lemmatized words.

For each token, a set containing the words within K words away is created. If the window size is K and the position of the target word is C, then all words in the domain [C-K, C+K] excluding C are returned.
Each target word is assigned a uniqueness value, which defines the uniqueness of a word in comparison to its context.
Averageand SortParameters: window size = 2, list size = 3
